text: KGGS (1340 AM) is a radio station licensed to serve the community of Garden City, Kansas. The station is owned by Steckline Communications, Inc., and airs a classic hits format. The station was assigned the KGGS call letters by the Federal Communications Commission on July 2, 2009. ==References== ==External links== * Official Website * GGS Category:Radio stations established in 2012 Category:2012 establishments in Kansas Category:Classic hits radio stations in the United States Category:Finney County, Kansas
title: KGGS
